item.title: Diversity in the Reading List
item.description: Happy International Women’s Day! In honor of, I’d like to share my reading list from 2015. Except for 2 non-fiction books I read for work, all of these works were written by women authors. Take a quick look: You by Caroline Kepnes Fuse by Julianna Baggott Burn by Julianna Baggott A Discovery of Witches by Deborah Harkness Over Sea, Under Stone by Susan Cooper The Dark is Rising by Susan Cooper Shadow of Night by Deborah Harkness Greenwitch by Susan Cooper The Cognitive Style of Power Point by Edward R.
